subject: Sports Injuries
Football
lead_paragraph: The Baltimore Ravens might be the best team in the A.F.C., but to stay that way, they’ll have to do it without star linebacker Ray Lewis, who will miss the rest of season with a torn triceps muscle.
snippet: The Baltimore Ravens might be the best team in the A.F.C., but to stay that way, they’ll have to do it without star linebacker Ray Lewis, who will miss the rest of season with a torn triceps muscle.
